title: Stirling crash: Driver killed after falling from reversing car
text:
An elderly driver who fell out of a reversing car in the Adelaide Hills has died in hospital after suffering serious injuries.

The incident occurred in a rear car park of the Stirling Hotel on Mount Barker Rd, Stirling, about 9am on Thursday.

Major Crash investigators will inspect the scene to understand how the 80-year-old woman, of Piccadilly, fell from the vehicle while it was in reverse.

She was rushed to the Royal Adelaide Hospital with life threatening injuries. She died in hospital on Thursday afternoon.

Anyone who witnessed this incident is asked to call Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000 or online at www.crimestopperssa.com.au.
description: An elderly driver who fell out of a reversing car in the Adelaide Hills has died in hospital.
